comment: Dr. Ali creates an engaging, supportive learning environment. His dynamic teaching blends clear explanations with real-world examples, making complex concepts accessible. While developing AI chatbots, he ensures thorough, easy-to-follow lessons, encouraging questions and critical thinking, leaving students confident and inspired. He's a great man!

Professor Ali Keyvanfar exemplifies excellence in teaching through a blend of deep subject knowledge, structured delivery, and an engaging, student-centered approach. From the outset, their passion for the subject matter is evident, fostering an environment where learning thrives.​One of the professor's standout qualities is their ability  present

Dr. Keyvanfar is very knowledgeable and presents the material clearly and in an organized way. He's responsive to questions and encourages class discussions. Overall, a great instructor and it was a nice course.

Dr Ali is the most suitable professor to lecture this course, his passion for AI reflects onto the students. The course was newly introduced to the department, Dr. Ali made it entertaining and informative. He was always up to date when there were new developments in AI, and would incorporate it into the content the next day. It was great semester.

Dr. Ali's practical, AI-focused teaching approach made complex topics simple and engaging. His patience, up-to-date knowledge, and guidance helped us build our own chatbots—a challenging task made easy. I truly enjoyed this course. Professors like him greatly benefit the university.

The professor demonstrates exceptional professional abilities, combining deep subject matter expertise with an engaging and effective teaching style. He consistently introduces innovative technologies and industry trends into the classroom, fostering a dynamic and forward-thinking learning environment.
Professor was awesome he communicated clearly and he was very helpful and knowledgeable in the AI field. He would be a great mentor for anyone very wise 5STARS
Learning with Professor Ali was really inspiring and great and have learned a lot related to AI in construction industry and was amazing learning new things.
Dr.Ali was very helpful in learning and understanding Generative AI. Great course
He is very smart and answers every question in a very kind manner.
I think Dr. Keyvanfar is an amazing professor and a even better person. I would absolutely take his Generative AI  again!!!
Great professor

Great professor overall! Would definitely take again. Very organized D2L. Accessible out of class. Flexible with grading. Make sure to do your homework on time because it will catch up to you. Overall, easy class.
rating_tags: Group projects--Lots of homework--Accessible outside class

comment: decent professor. Absolutely little work at the beginning of the semester that becomes so much work at the end. He doesnt use d2l, instead everything is done through google forms. If this concerns you, it will be hard to stay organized. A semester long group project. Listen to fairly boring online lectures and answer questions, thats the homework.
Online platform was well organized and given plenty of time to complete work.  Would take again.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--Online Savvy

comment: Professor Ali is a very great teacher. He is always open to questions regarding course content and even homework.

I Highly recommend taking Ali Keyvanfar. He is extremely knowledgeable and accepts feedback from students. The workload is not crazy, but you still learn a lot. He gives a mutual respect to his students when it comes to treating them like construction professionals (as many of us are already in the construction industry).

Prof. Ali is very organized, detail-oriented, and passionate about students' learning outcomes. He is easily accessible for assistance if you need clarity, quite knowledgeable, and very resourceful. I recommend taking his course offerings.

Professor Ali is very organized, class is well structured in a format that is very intuitive. Work load is consistent with the course level and properly paced for the semester. Prof Ali is always available to interact with students and is always willing to go beyond that required to ensure learning is achieved. I highly recommend Prof Ali.
Professor Keyvanfar has a great experience in construction management. Clear courses, well explained, step by step, I never enjoyed an online class like his, well organized.
Professor Keyvanfar is very knowledgeable and works well with each student individually if they ask for it. Whatever effort you put into the course will equate to your results.

The professor is very understanding of his students. His ultimate goal is to get students to understand the criteria throughout the semester. The PowerPoint and d2l lecture videos will aid you through the major of the course. if any questions arise regarding the work, he'll be there to answer them. I would 100% choose him again.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--Online Savvy

comment: The course content is easy and pace of the class is slow. He knows the material well. The issue is that it is very boring material, and his use of multiple platforms does not make up for this experience. He uses google forms which is terrible interface for quizzes.

He is a very good prodessor, however, it is kind of difficult to understand what assignments were already submitted due to having to submit them through google forms, and getting the email. Otherwise, good professor.
Great Professor. I would encourage anyone to take him.

Semester long group project that is not too difficult. Assignments are straight forward and graded fairly. The material is what is boring and his teaching methods are not the best. The quizzes are where it gets difficult, even with them being open note.
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Group projects--Clear grading criteria

comment: Get away from this professor. Inconsistent and terrible with technology. You CONSTANTLY switch between, Excel, Powerpoint, D2L, Google Docs, References. SO. MANY. TIMES. It's almost crazy. The way his class is set up for online could be 100% better. Unorganized online structure made this class way harder and more frustrating than it should've been

Ali is not consistent with his teaching, the material he teaches are conceptual and don't make sense. He is there to bring funding into the department, and has no experience in US construction industry. School needs a real professor.
